answers.answer: Well its because the drink they give you is so sugary so its probably just if you eat really sugary carb loaded stuff your body may not react well. I was the same my sugar only went up occassionaly. Like I could never eat cereal it was weird. Just keep checking to make sure it will all be over soon.
I had gestational diabetes really bad to the point where I had to inject myself with insulin. Hopefully and it doesn't sound like you will end up like that. Good luck hun xx

question: So my doctor says I have gb. I've been doing my blood sugar testing as I'm supposed to but it's never high and I'm eating like I always do. Idk if he is crazy or what but all I know is I get a sonogram in 2 weeks I'm so excited haven't seen my little man since I was 16 weeks I'm 31 weeks tomorrow
title: gestational diabetes.
